examples.korean: Their objectives and methods require further elucidation. 발음듣기 그들의 목적과 방법은 더 많은 설명이 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their objectives and methods require further elucidation. 발음

examples.korean: Our objectives need to be precisely delineated. 발음듣기 우리의 목적을 정확히 기술할 필요가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our objectives need to be precisely delineated. 발음

examples.korean: The aims of the treaty are stated in its preamble. 발음듣기 그 조약의 목적은 전문에 명시되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The aims of the treaty are stated in its preamble. 발음

examples.korean: The rule was introduced expressly for this purpose. 발음듣기 그 법률은 특별히 이런 목적을 위해 도입되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rule was introduced expressly for this purpose. 발음

examples.korean: Their aim was to block guerrilla supply lines. 발음듣기 그들의 목적은 게릴라들의 보급선을 차단하는 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their aim was to block guerrilla supply lines. 발음
